name: Fury
description: In 2011, I did not think of myself as an artist. I had only just discovered that 3-dimensional fractals had been invented/discovered two years before, and they fascinated me. I loved combining different formulae to see what would happen. Flying through fractal mathscapes and finding unique, interesting-looking shapes and scenes was, and still is, a thrilling experience. But I was just playing around...    - // -   And then one day, I made this. I recognised it immediately as something special. I took longer than usual with it, playing around with parameters and colours, and eventually, rather proudly, saved the final image as a PNG.  - // -   I would only give it its title months later, when I looked back and remembered what I was going through at the time. I was in Brazil, gradually being abandoned after almost two years, and more alone than I'd ever felt. And there had been fury... Fury at her, at life, at myself, for letting myself follow my heart into such despair.
